snippet.title: Organs Please — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Organs Please is a satirical management sim, where you take control of a recycling factory with a twist — it recycles humans.
Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/OrgansPlz

As Overseer of a last ditch salvation effort, you decide who gets to escape our dying planet in a cozy spaceship and who sacrifices (literally) their blood and sweat for humanity. Enjoy the first trailer for Organs Please!
